attributes.action: Add Rottweilers to the breeds covered by the Dangerous Dogs Act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the deaths of Archie-Lee Hirst and a nine-week-old girl (the latter case in Melbourne, Australia)within the last few days from rottweiler attacks, this breed should be added to the list of those covered by the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
